thread.title: Miura Systems Teams Up With Leading US Distributor POS Portal to Meet Sky High EMV Demand
thread.title_full: Miura Systems Teams Up With Leading US Distributor POS Portal to Meet Sky High EMV Demand - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Miura Systems Teams Up With Leading US Distributor POS Portal to Meet Sky High EMV Demand
text:
Miura Systems Limited announces a key new partnership with leading USA distributor POS Portal
Stokenchurch, UK and Sacaramento, CA (PRWEB) October 26, 2015
Miura Systems is delighted to announce a major new partnership with leading distributor POS Portal which will help meet the growing demand for EMV technology by putting our award-winning POS and mPOS products in the hands of US customers even faster.
Miura Systems is a fast-growing UK-based mPOS provider which has already bagged number three spot in the prestigious Sunday Times BT Business SME Export Track 100 as a company with one of the fastest growing overseas sales of any SME in the country.
Having already partnered with big name brands including Square, PayPal, and NCR in the US market, Miura is now ready to offer similar solutions to all payments integrators.
POS Portal has been selling Payment Acceptance Devices and Point of Sale equipment with remarkable success to the US market for over 15 years, with a reputation for excellent service, availability, and a great selection of items.
POS Portal is accelerating point-of-sale (POS) hardware distribution for the payments industry with its Portal Connect Program, which gets hardware straight to the end consumer and connects OEMs with merchant acquirers, independent sales organizations (ISOs), independent software vendors (ISVs) and merchants. Miura Systems is now a part of this program.
Portal Connect creates an ecosystem for manufacturers and merchant service providers, helping them navigate and manage the complex and ever changing payments landscape. The program also provides its partners with tracking and management capabilities so they focus on building their business and don’t spend valuable time tracking run rates and managing lead times.
“We knew we could make the distribution process work better for the benefit of all the different players who touch the industry,” said Shobhit Kumar, Product Marketing Manager, POS Portal. “Portal Connect is the fastest way the POS industry has seen to get hardware into merchants’ hands and into new markets and verticals.”
The items below – available now from POS Portal for immediate delivery – can be bundled with payment applications to create robust solutions for both POS and mPOS providers as well as PSPs and processors.
The following are available now from POS Portal:
M010: an industry leading chip and PIN reader for mobile and tablet. The MSR, EMV, and NFC-ready Bluetooth-enabled device also accepts Apple Pay and Samsung Pay for the latest in contactless payments.
M010 Retail Cradle: a stylish, cradle which holds the M010 atop an integrated pole mount and charges via the built-in USB connector.
M010 Desktop Cradle: holds the M010 in place and charges via the integrated USB connector.
M010 Fast Charge Cradle: takes less than an hour to charge the M010 via dedicated Fast Charge points.
M010 Fast Charge Rack: this tiered rack will accommodate up to five M010 devices at a time and can be desktop or wall mounted.
M007: a game-changing MSR, EMV, and NFC-ready Bluetooth-enabled PIN pad which brings mPOS to mainstream retail. Also supports Apple Pay and Samsung Pay for next-generation contactless payments.
EMV demand is sky-rocketing in the US thanks to an industry mandate that says all stores should accept Chip and PIN from 1 October.
As a best-in-class distribution partner, POS Portal will help Miura meet this demand and get its growing portfolio of products out as quickly as possible by holding stock at its US facilities.
POS Portal will also bring its 15 years of experience to bear in the payment products space by offering Miura Systems customers sales and support.
“We are tremendously excited to introduce POS Portal as our US distribution partner. We chose this best in class organization to satisfy the incredible demand for EMV solutions in the US market.” Mark Little, Business Development Director – The Americas
About Miura Systems ( http://www.Miurasystems.com )
Miura Systems are the global leading provider of innovative secure electronic payment hardware to the mPOS solution marketplace. Miura partners with Independent Software Vendors and Systems Integrators to deliver platforms, expertise and services to enable retailers and acquirers to provide rich and flexible payment solutions for retail, hospitality, financial and transportation markets globally.
About POS Portal ( http://www.posportal.com )
Since 2000, POS Portal has achieved a leadership position in the point-of-sale industry by providing unparalleled levels of customer service and technology innovation to its partners. POS Portal's bi-coastal distribution facilities ship over 1,200 POS devices every day to merchants nationwide. POS Portal is committed to continuing the relentless pursuit of our corporate mission: To provide exceptional customer service and point-of-sale innovation.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13042708.htm
